casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Appellee, v. Allen KLEIN, Appellant. No. 116, Docket 71-1464. United States Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Argued Oct. 6, 1971. Decided Oct. 13, 1971. Max Freund, New York City (Rosen-man, Colin, Kaye, Petschek, Freund & Emil, New York City, on the brief), for appellant. Alan B. Morrison, Asst. U. S. Atty., for appellee.

Before MOORE, HAYS and FEIN-BERG, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

The decision of the district court is affirmed.
